mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.specialreq_code AS "specialreqCode", a.specialreq_name AS "specialreqName", a.specialreq_univalent AS "specialreqUnivalent", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_sales_specialreq( id, contract_id, specialreq_code, specialreq_name, specialreq_univalent, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contractId}, #{specialreqCode}, #{specialreqName}, #{specialreqUnivalent}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contract_sales_specialreq SET contract_id = #{contractId}, specialreq_code = #{specialreqCode}, specialreq_name = #{specialreqName}, specialreq_univalent = #{specialreqUnivalent}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
